name: get_coin_issuance_blockchains
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Get the issuance blockchains on which the coin is issued.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

uuid.description: UUID of the coin for which the blockchains are being requested.

offset.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 50, with a valid range of 0-100.
